entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character and protagonist of the story. He is used to getting onto platform nine and three-quarters by now.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends who accompanies him on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another one of Harry's friends who joins them in getting onto platform nine and three-quarters.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is a small owl that accompanies Hermione on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: crookshanks
entities.description: Crookshanks is another animal that accompanies Ron and his friends on the Hogwarts Express.

entities.name: hogwarts express
entities.description: The Hogwarts Express is a steam engine train that takes students from Platform 9 3/4 to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

entities.name: platform nine and three-quarters
entities.description: Platform nine and three-quarters is the platform where students board the Hogwarts Express to go to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

relationships.description: Harry boards the Hogwarts Express from Platform 9 3/4.
Ron also boards the Hogwarts Express from Platform 9 3/4.
Hermione joins her friends on the Hogwarts Express from Platform 9 3/4.
The Hogwarts Express carries Harry to Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.
